name: Reconnaissance - Search Victim-Owned Websites (T1594)
description: Detects attempts to probe or collect information from victim-owned websites during reconnaissance. This may include accessing sensitive paths like robots.txt, sitemap.xml, phpinfo.php, or using DNS/web commands to enumerate victim web infrastructure.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR curl.exe OR wget.exe) AND (process.args:(*Invoke-WebRequest* OR *Invoke-RestMethod* OR *curl* OR *wget* OR *robots.txt* OR *sitemap.xml* OR *phpinfo.php* OR *server-status* OR *Resolve-DnsName* OR *dig* OR *nslookup*))
